Author: venusbird
Text: god, i hate comparison. that must be so hard to deal with. your health is the most important thing so i would suggest checking into the services they have at your school, or a community type thing (youth centre etc).   one thing that has helped me with comparison is focusing on my qualities that aren’t appearance based. it’s so flimsy and subjective — she may be comparing herself to you! it seems like you’re a hard worker and good at your craft, to get into a rigorous program. you’re also determined and resilient. not everyone makes time for therapy while in school (even if you stop now for financial reasons).
